item.title: 特朗普对华关税在 2025 年末仍将维持在 30% 的水平
item.description: 分析师和投资者表示，唐纳德-特朗普对中国征收的关税很可能在90天休战期结束后仍将维持在预计会严重抑制中国对美出口的水平，这表明尽管谈判正在积极进行，但中国政府可能不得不忍受进一步的经济痛苦。【原文：Donald Trump’s tariffs on China will likely remain at a level expected to severely curtail Chinese exports to the US after the 90-day truce, analysts and investors say, suggesting Beijing may have to endure further economic pain despite active talks.】

item.title: 印度 Greenko 公司创始人希望达成新协议，从 Orix 收购股权
item.description: 印度清洁能源生产商绿科能源控股公司（Greenko Energy Holdings）的创始人仍在努力收购奥克斯公司（Orix Corp.【原文：The founders of Indian clean energy producer Greenko Energy Holdings are still working on purchasing Orix Corp.’s stake in the company, despite the Japanese financial group’s announcement cancelling the sale, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，亚洲交易员缩减降息押注
item.description: 在中美贸易摩擦出现缓和迹象后，市场预计亚洲新兴出口依赖型经济体的央行将不会采取过于激进的宽松政策。【原文：Markets are pricing in less aggressive policy easing by central banks in emerging Asia’s export-dependent economies, following signs of reduced trade frictions between the US and China.】

item.title: 日本经济在关税冲击前一年来首次出现萎缩
item.description: 日本经济一年来首次出现萎缩，这表明日本在承受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税措施的影响之前就已经十分脆弱。【原文：Japan’s economy shrank for the first time in a year, illustrating its vulnerability even before sustaining the impact of US President Donald Trump’s tariff measures.】

item.title: 伊朗潜在协议引发供应担忧，石油止跌回升
item.description: 由于美国和伊朗之间可能达成的核协议有可能加剧今年晚些时候的供应过剩，石油在连续两天下跌后持稳。【原文：Oil was steady after two days of losses as a potential nuclear deal between the US and Iran risks exacerbating a glut forecast for later this year.】

item.title: 美国数据疲软刺激降息押注，黄金收复部分失地
item.description: 本周早些时候，由于疲软的美国经济数据引发了对美联储进一步降息的押注，债券收益率下挫，黄金收复了部分惨重跌幅。【原文：Gold retraced some of the heavy losses it incurred earlier this week, after bond yields sank on weak US economic data that raised bets on further Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 林纳斯公司成为中国以外首个重稀土生产商
item.description: 莱纳斯稀土有限公司（Lynas Rare Earths Ltd.）在一份声明中表示，该公司已成为中国以外首个所谓 "重 "稀土的商业生产商，在其位于马来西亚的工厂提炼氧化镝。【原文：Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. has become the first commercial producer of so-called ‘heavy’ rare earths outside China, refining dysprosium oxide at its facility in Malaysia, it said in a statement.】

item.title: 大卖场、贝因美可能被纳入恒生指数
item.description: Pop Mart International Group Ltd.可能是即将进行的香港股票基准审查的主要候选公司之一，因为指数编制者试图扩大成分股，以更好地反映市场的构成。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd. may be among prime candidates for inclusion in the upcoming review of Hong Kong’s stock benchmark, as the index compiler seeks to expand the constituents to better reflect the market’s composition.】

item.title: 中国初创企业在沙特阿拉伯试运行首家人工智能医生诊所
item.description: 一家中国初创公司在沙特阿拉伯开设了世界上第一家人工智能诊断诊所，这是取代人类医生作为医疗第一线的关键一步。【原文：A Chinese startup has opened the world’s first clinic in Saudi Arabia where artificial intelligence diagnoses patients, a key step in replacing human doctors as the first line of medical treatment.】

item.title: 罢工最后期限临近，新泽西公交公司与铁路工会就工资问题争论不休
item.description: 新泽西运输公司和铁路工会仍在为加薪幅度争论不休，这是避免罢工导致全州火车系统瘫痪的主要症结所在。【原文：New Jersey Transit and its rail union are still tussling over the level of pay increases, the main sticking point to avoid a strike that would cripple the train system statewide.】

item.title: 前高盛银行家领导中国推动重振香港金融业
item.description: 当中国在香港的金融事务联络人提出重振香港市场的计划时，在场的人都大吃一惊。【原文：The crowd was taken aback as China’s point person for financial matters in Hong Kong laid out plans to re-energize the city’s markets.】

item.title: 贸易休整反弹持续，股票和债券攀升：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股票期货受到华尔街股市上涨的支撑，这表明股市涨势仍在继续。由于交易商对美联储今年的两次降息进行了定价，国债上涨。【原文：Asian equity futures were supported by gains on Wall Street in a sign the stock market rally has further to run. Treasuries advanced as traders priced in two Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 伯利在贸易战前夕押注英伟达和中国股市
item.description: 迈克尔-伯里（Michael Burry）的 Scion Asset Management 公司在第一季度清算了几乎全部股票投资组合，同时在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战并引发全球市场动荡之前，对英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Michael Burry’s Scion Asset Management liquidated almost its entire equity portfolio in the first quarter, while taking on fresh bearish wagers on Nvidia Corp. and China-related stocks before US President Donald Trump launched a trade war and roiled global markets.】

item.title: 中国通货紧缩浪潮必将提振新兴市场债券
item.description: 基金经理们表示，中国出口转向新兴市场的浪潮很可能有助于抑制发展中国家的通货膨胀，并支持期限较长的债券。【原文：A wave of Chinese exports redirected toward emerging markets is likely to help crimp inflation across the developing world and bolster longer-maturity bonds, fund managers say.】

item.title: 中国热爱流行音乐的 Z 世代为投资者带来巨大收益
item.description: 中国试图抵消关税带来的损失，但却得到了 "Z世代 "的帮助。"Z世代 "在从玩具到泡沫红茶等各种产品上都大手大脚。【原文：China’s attempt to offset the damage of tariffs is getting a helping hand from Generation Z, which is spending big on everything from toys to bubble tea.】

item.title: 财政部副部长称八月是 X 日期担忧的最早时间点
item.description: 美国财政部副部长迈克尔-福尔肯德（Michael Faulkender）表示，联邦税收收入一直高于一年前，这有助于增强人们的信心，使人们相信八月份是关注联邦债务限额的最早时间点。【原文：Deputy Treasury Secretary Michael Faulkender said that federal tax receipts have been coming in higher than a year ago, helping bolster confidence that August is the earliest point for concerns about staying within the federal debt limit.】

item.title: 美国例外时代是否即将结束？
item.description:
上个月，市场对唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战做出了严厉的裁决。它们还可能加速了美国经济主导地位的衰落。【原文：

Markets delivered a withering verdict on Donald Trump’s trade war last month. They also may have turbocharged the decline of US economic primacy. 

】

item.title: 微软首席执行官谈人工智能将如何重塑包括微软在内的所有公司
item.description:
对于萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）和这家全球最有价值的公司来说，紧张的客户以及与 OpenAI 不稳定的合作关系正在使事情变得更加复杂。【原文：

Nervous customers and a volatile partnership with OpenAI are complicating things for Satya Nadella and the world’s most valuable company.

】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司抵御市场下跌，减持银行股
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统发动贸易战之前的市场低迷时期，沃伦-巴菲特的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. made no major purchases during the market slump that preceded President Donald Trump’s trade war, instead whittling or selling off holdings in financial stocks during the first quarter.】

item.title: 肉类公司 Marfrig 出价收购 BRF 剩余股份
item.description: Marfrig Global Foods SA 同意收购其尚未持有的巴西顶级鸡肉生产商 BRF SA 的股份。【原文：Marfrig Global Foods SA agreed to acquire the shares it doesn’t already own in Brazil’s top chicken producer BRF SA.】

item.title: 中国销售额下滑，应用材料公司预测不温不火
item.description: 美国最大的芯片制造设备制造商应用材料公司（Applied Materials Inc.【原文：Applied Materials Inc., the largest American maker of chip-manufacturing equipment, gave a lackluster forecast for the current period, highlighting the potential cost of the US trade dispute with China.】

item.title: 安大略省将向海外出售更多债务，因为赤字和支出都在增长
item.description: 安大略省计划借贷 598 亿加元（427 亿美元），为更大的预算赤字以及高速公路和其他基础设施支出提供资金，并预计其中更多资金将来自外币债券销售。【原文：Ontario plans to borrow C$59.8 billion ($42.7 billion) to fund a larger budget deficit and spending on highways and other infrastructure, and expects more of it will come from foreign currency bond sales.】

item.title: 贸易战使安大略省预算赤字接近流行病水平
item.description: 由于贸易战的影响损害了经济增长，安大略省的预算缺口预计将达到自19世纪科维德大流行以来的最高水平。【原文：Ontario’s budget shortfall is expected to reach its highest level since the beginning of the Covid-19 pandemic as the effects of the trade war hurt economic growth.】

item.title: 特朗普及其盟友为不受约束的人工智能发展铺平道路
item.description: 白宫和国会中的一些共和党人已经开始为一个监管更少的人工智能新时代奠定基础。但首先...【原文：The White House and some Republicans in Congress have begun to lay the groundwork for a new AI era with far less regulation. But first...】

item.title: iPhone 供应商 TDK 为轻薄型人工智能小工具准备电池
item.description: TDK 公司正准备推出新一代电池，通过人工智能任务为智能手机供电，而其主要客户苹果公司也正准备推出一款更轻薄的手机。【原文：TDK Corp. is readying a new generation of batteries to power smartphones through AI tasks at a time that major client Apple Inc. is also preparing to launch a slimmer handset.】

item.title: Christian Dior Couture 客户数据遭网络攻击泄露
item.description: Christian Dior Couture 遭受网络攻击，黑客获取了部分客户数据。【原文：Christian Dior Couture has been hit by a cyber attack, with hackers obtaining some of its customers’ data.】

item.title: 有报道称 Meta 将推迟旗舰人工智能机型上市，Meta 股价因此下滑
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司股价下跌，原因是有报道称这家社交网络公司正在推迟推出一款旗舰人工智能模型，这引发了人们对其人工智能推进工作的担忧。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. shares declined on a report that the social networking company is delaying a flagship artificial intelligence model, sparking concerns about its AI push.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会在元垄断案庭审中搁置案件，将重点转向辩护
item.description: 联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）结束了对 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：The Federal Trade Commission wrapped up its case for breaking up Meta Platforms Inc. as an illegal social-media monopoly, with the company now set to lay out its defense in the ongoing antitrust trial.】

item.title: 增长放缓，墨西哥银行连续第三次降息半点
item.description: 墨西哥央行周四将借贷成本下调了半个百分点，此前该国经济险些陷入衰退，通胀率也保持在目标范围内。【原文：Mexico’s central bank cut borrowing costs by half a percentage point Thursday after the economy narrowly avoided falling into recession and inflation remained within the target range.】

item.title: 前澳大利亚央行董事会成员敦促暂停加息以避免财政支出过多
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行前董事会成员沃里克-麦基宾（Warwick McKibbin）表示，在货币政策接近中性（既不刺激也不减缓经济活动）的情况下，澳大利亚采取了 "非常大的 "财政刺激措施，这表明储备银行下周应维持利率不变。【原文：Australia’s “very large” fiscal stimulus at a time when monetary policy is around neutral — neither stimulating nor slowing economic activity — suggests the Reserve Bank should keep interest rates unchanged next week, former board member Warwick McKibbin said.】
